deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0401 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
MM MedicareMedicare
C Medi-CalMedi-Cal

name: GovernmentReimbursementProgram
title: governmentReimbursementProgram
description: Code system of concepts which specify codes that indicate an agency that the practitioner is authorized to bill for medical services.  Existing codes only for use in the United States. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PRA segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0401 (Government Reimbursement Program)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
